siteMetadata.title: My Collection of Markdowns
siteMetadata.description: This is my collection of various documentation.

markdownRemark.html:
General information and Docker commands

List of commands

Command Description
docker pull Pull image
docker images List all images
docker rmi Remove image
docker build Build image
docker run Run a command in a new container
docker ps -a Show all containers
docker rm Remove container

Other

docker system prune will remove all stopped containers, all dangling images and all build cache.
